Test Name: Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) RNA Detection and Quantification by Real-Time RT-PCR
Purpose: To detect and quantify Hepatitis C Virus RNA in plasma or serum for diagnosis, treatment decisions, and monitoring of infection.
Container: EDTA tube (plasma) or serum separator tube (serum)
Equipment: Real-Time PCR thermocycler, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer, biosafety cabinet
